description.ruby-sapphire:
A rampage of 2 to 3 turns
that confuses the user.
description.emerald:
A rampage of 2 to 3 turns
that confuses the user.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user thrashes
about for two to
three turns, then
becomes confused.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user rampages
and attacks for two
to three turns.
However, it then
becomes confused.

turns. The user then becomes confused.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
effect.shortEffect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.
